::Hot Rod::

He jumped back but with being so close, 5 of the shots managed to hit
his leg. He kneeled down, and attempted to sweep the legs out from
underneith Dragonfly.

OOC: Last post for tonight. We'll continue this tomorrow Airly. G'night
everyone!
